item.description: I am a third-year master student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Hong Liu. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT) in 2017.

I am a third-year CS master student of School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University (PKU). It’s my great honor to be here to learn from Prof. Zhouchen Lin and a lot of excellent lab-mates. Before this, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from University of Science & Technology of Beijing(USTB) and double degree in economics from National School of Development, Peking University (PKU) in 2017.

I am to be a third-year CS master student at Peking University. Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Shandong University in 2017.

Currently, I am a fourth-year graduate student at Center for Data Science, Academy for Advanced Interdisciplinary Studies, Peking University. I am co-supervised by Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Dongmin Chen, and do researches on computer vision and machine learning. I obtained my bachelor’s degree of applied physics from Nanjing University of Information Science & Technology in 2016.

I am an assistant professor at Capital Normal University. I completed my Ph.D. from Beijing Jiaotong University under the supervision of Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Jian Yu. I received the Excellent Ph.D. Thesis Award by Beijing Society of Image and Graphics in 2018.
I currently focus on topics related to Quantitative Finanace and statistical/ numerical approaches to them.

I am a third-year Ph.D. student in School of Mathematical Sciences at Peking University advised by Professor Zhouchen Lin and Professor Jiansheng Yang. I also obtained my bachelors here in 2013.

My research focusses broadly on machine learning and Applied Mathematics, including topics in Differentiable Programming, Computer Vision and Graph Neural Networks. I am particularly excited in explaining deep learning models with mathematical tools.

Yong received the Ph.D. degree in computer science and engineering from Beihang University (BUAA), Beijing, China, in 2019. He is currently working as a ``Boya” Postdoctor in the Key Lab. of Machine Perception, School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University, Beijing, China. He has been funded as a visiting Ph.D. student in UCL and Birkbeck from January 2018 to January 2019. His general research interests include machine learning, data mining and numerical optimization.

I am a CS student who likes being dedicated to mathematics. Willing and waiting for enrollment of Peking University, now in the fourth year of undergraduate, I am enhancing my ability in machine learning and mathematics.

I am now a post-doc in Princeton University working with Jason Lee. Before that, I got my Ph.D. in Peking University advised by Zhouchen Lin and Tong Zhang. I am currently interested in theoretic anlysis on machine learning and optimization.

I am a senior undergraduate student at Sichuan University. Since Sept. 2018, I have become an intern at ZERO Lab and Zhejiang Lab under the supervision of Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Currently, I pursue my research in representation learning and differentiable programming.

I’m Bin Hao, a quant researcher in ChinaAMC. Before that, I received my M.Sc. degree in machine learning from School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University in 2017, advised by Professor Zhouchen Lin.

I am a first-year CS phd student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin . Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China(UESTC) in 2019.

I am a third-year GIS master student at Peking University (PKU) now. I’m honored to be a member of the ZERO Lab led by Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Wuhan University (WHU) in 2017.

I am currently a software engineer in Microsoft to develop the relevance model for Bing ads. Before that, I was lucky enough to obtain a bachelor and master degree in Peking University, supervised by Prof. Zhouchen Lin.

I obtained Master’s Degree in Intelligence Science and Technology from Peking University in 2017. Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Prior to studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from SCUT in 2014.

I’m a Ph.D. student in the Mathematics Department at Hong Kong Baptist University, supervised by Prof. TAI Xue-cheng. During 2016-2017, I was lucky enough to be an intern under the supervision of Prof. Zhouchen Lin. My current interests are mainly image processing and deep learning.
I was a post-doc researcher working with Prof. Zhouchen Lin from 2017 to 2019.

I am to be a first-year CS master student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Peking University.

I am to be a fourth-year CS PhD student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from University of Science and Technology Beijing (USTB) in 2016.

I am to be a first-year CS master student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Prof. Zhouchen Lin. My research interest is at the intersection of artificial intelligence and finance or economics. I’m also insterested in how to to replace old growth drivers with new ones and speed up structural improvement and upgrading.
I am a third-year master student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin . I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Tongji University in 2012.

I am an assistant professor at Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics. I have graduated from Peking University (PKU) supervised by Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor degree from Central South University in 2011.

I am a post-doc researcher working with Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Chao Xu on neural network optimization. I completed my Ph.D. from Beijing Jiaotong University under the supervision of Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Jian Yu. I received the Excellent Ph.D. Thesis Awards by Beijing Jiaotong University (2017) and Beijing Society of Image and Graphics (2019), respectively.

I am to be a second-year CS PhD student at Peking University (PKU). I am lucky to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin and many outstanding labmates. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from University of Science and Techonlogy of China (USTC) in 2018.
I am currently working at Alibaba-inc. Before that, I obtained my PhD degree from PKU in 2019. I was very lucky to be co-supervised by Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Hongbin Zha.

Dr. Zhouchen Lin is a Professor in Department of Machine Intelligence, School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University.

I am now recruiting Ph.D.s who have strong mathematical abilities (however, this does not imply that you have to come from mathematics department) and great interest in theoretical analysis in order to enjoy with me how to use mathematics to solve real problems elegantly. I am also recruiting Masters who have strong coding skills and interests in Quantitative Trading (a reference book). Welcome to send me your detailed resume!

I am currently a full professor with Digital Media Department at International School of Information Science and Engineering, Dalian University of Technology (DUT). I obtained my B.S. and Ph.D. degrees both from Dalian University of Technology, China, working with Prof.Zhouchen Lin. I was also doing joint PhD research in Carnegie Mellon University from September 2010 to January 2012.
I am currently a senior researcher at SenseTime Inc. I obtained my PhD degree from The Chinese Univeristy of Hong Kong.

I am currently a Postdoctoral Research Associate at Carnegie Mellon University. I obtained my phd degree from the National University of Singapore, working closely with Profs. Jiashi Feng, Shuicheng Yan and Zhouchen Lin.

I graduated from at Peking University (PKU) as a master student in 2017. Here I am lucky to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Zhejiang University in 2014.

I am a first-year Ph.D. student in School of Science and Engineering at the Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen advised by Prof. Zhi-Quan Luo and Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before joining CUHK(SZ), I completed my bachelor’s and master’s degree in 2016 and 2019 in South China University of Technology, respectively.

I am a first-year master student in Machine Learning Department at Carnegie Mellon University. Prior to that, I got my Bachelor’s degree in Peking University, where I was honored to be supervised by Prof. Zhouchen Lin.

I am Senior Researcher at Tencent AI Lab. Formerly I was a researcher in the Visual Geometry Group (VGG) at the University of Oxford, where I worked with Prof. Andrew Zisserman.

I received my PhD in Computer Science from the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, under the supervision of Prof. Qingming Huang. I was also supervised by Prof. Zhouchen Lin at Peking University. My research interests are in computer vision and deep learning.

I am currently a third-year Ph.D. student in School of Mathematical Sciences at Peking University at Peking University, advised by Profs. Jinwen Ma and Zhouchen Lin. I obtained my bachelor’s degree of mathematics from Wuhan University Of Technology in 2017.

I am a third year graduate student at Center for Data Science of Peking University. I conduct my graduate research under the supervision of Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Zhanxing Zhu. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from SouthWestern University of Finance and Economics (SWUFE) in 2017.

I am a first-year Statistics master student at Peking University (PKU). I’m a layman in machine learning but I’m willing to learn anything. I graduated in 2019 from THU majoring in mathematics with a BS. degree.
I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin. In Lin’s lab, conducting pure, interesting and cool research will encourage me to go with, always.

I am a second-year graduate student at Center for Data Science of Peking University, supervised by Prof.Zhouchen Lin and Doc.Sixin Zhang.Before that, I obtained my Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China in 2018.

I am a Ph.D. student in the Computer Science department at Princeton University, co-advised by professor Szymon Rusinkiewicz and professor Thomas Funkhouser. Prior to joining Princeton, I got my Bachelor’s Degree in Intelligence Science and Technology from Peking University in 2018. I am currently interested in visual and 3D understanding of the world through learning. I was a research intern at Google, Sensetime Group Limited, Stanford University (advised by Prof. Leonidas Guibas), and Microsoft Research Asia.

I’m Jianlong Wu, a tenure-track assistant professor in School of Computer Science and Technology, Shandong University(Qingdao Campus). Before that, I received my Ph.D. degree in computer vision from School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University in 2019, advised by Professor Zhouchen Lin and Professor Hongbin Zha.

I am a senior undergraduate student at Peking University (PKU). Since Feb. 2018, I have become an intern at ZERO Lab. Currently I’m also a research intern at Microsoft Research Asia Machine Learning Group.

I’m Yu Xia, a quant developer working in E Fund. Before that, I received my M.Sc. degree in machine learning from School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University in 2019, advised by Professor Zhouchen Lin.

I am currently a Ph.D. student at ZERO-LAB, hosted by Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before joining Peking Unversity, I completed my bachelor’s and master’s degree in 2016 and 2019, respectively, and was fortunate to be co-advised by Prof. Guangcan Liu. My research interests broadly include theories and applications of deep and differentiable models, such as learning-based optimization, the convergence of non-convex/convex optimization, low-rank data recovery, asymptotic analysis, and PDE/ODE.

I am currently working at Alibaba-inc to develop recommendation systems for Taobao App. Before that, I obtained my PhD degree from PKU in 2018. I was very lucky to be co-supervised by Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Hongbin Zha.
My research interest is machine learning.

I am currently a Master 2 student in Optimization, at Department of Mathematics, Université Paris-Sud (XI), France. Before that, I spent one year at École Polytechnique, France as a Master 1 student in Computer Science. I obtained my B.E. degree from Peking University, China, and I am lucky to do my bachelor thesis under supervision of Prof.Lin.

I am working on a master’s degree in Department of Precision Instruments, Tsinghua University. I obtained my Bachelor of Engineering (B.Eng) degree from Department of Automatic Control, Shandong University in 2017.My primary research interests lie in machine learning and computer vision. Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin.

I’m graduated from Peking University(PKU) and now working at JP Morgan Beijing QR(Quantitative Research) Center. It was a great honor to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin during my postgraduate period. And I obtained my bachelor degree of engineering from Beijing Jiaotong University. My current interests are mainly the quantitative finance and deep learning technicals in finance. Feel free to contact me via my email.
I am a second-year DS master student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to be a part of ZERO Lab. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Shanghai University.

I am a third-year CS master student at Peking University and major in quantitative research. My mentor is Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I got my bachelor’s degree at University Of Science & Technology Beijing

bio: I am now working as an engineer in the Bank of China. I received my master’s degree from ZERO Lab, Peking University in 2016, and bachelor’s degree from the Department of communication engineering, Wuhan University in 2013.

I am a Postdoc fellow at Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago (TTIC), hosted by Avrim Blum and Greg Shakhnarovich. Before joining TTIC, I completed my Ph.D. degree in 2019 with wonderful 4-year study at Machine Learning Department, Carnegie Mellon University. I was fortunate to be co-advised by Maria-Florina Balcan and David P. Woodruff. Before joining CMU, I graduated from Peking University in 2015, working with Zhouchen Lin and Chao Zhang. My research interests broadly include theories and applications of machine learning and algorithms, such as adversarial defenses and attacks, non-convex/convex optimization, deep learning, low-rank subspace recovery, noise-tolerant active learning, property testing, and compressed sensing.

I am a lecturer at College of Liberal Arts and Sciences, National University of Defense and Technology. My research interests include computer vision, pattern recognition and machine learning. I had been a visiting PhD student at Peking University in Lin’s Lab during 2013-2015. I received the B.S. degree in mathematics from University of Science and Technology of China in 2009, and the Ph.D. degree in applied mathematics from National University of Defense and Technology in 2016.

I am a second-year DS master student at Peking University (PKU). Here I am lucky enough to work with Prof. Zhouchen Lin. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Chung Yuan Christian University in Taiwan.

I graduated from Peking University (PKU) in 2019. From 2016, I was fortunately directed by Prof. Zhouchen Lin and Prof. Chao Zhang. Before studying in PKU, I obtained my bachelor’s degree from Beijing University Of Posts And Telecommunications (BUPT) in 2016.

I am currently a Ph.D. candidate at National University of Singapore (NUS), fortunately advised by Dr. Jiashi Feng and Dr. Shuicheng Yan. Before studying in NUS, I graduated from Peking University (PKU) in 2016 and during this period of time, I was fortunately directed by Dr. Zhouchen Lin and Dr. Chao Zhang.
